question: Which Union Ministry of India has launched 'KAPILA' campaign?
explanation:
Union Education Minister Ramesh Pokhriyal Nishank has virtually launched the ' KAPILA' Kalam Program for Intellectual Property Literacy and Awareness campaign.
Under the initiative, of higher educational institutions will be made aware of the application process for patenting their invention. It has been launched on the 89th birth anniversary of former President Dr APJ Abdul Kalam, also celebrated as 'National Innovation Day', across the country.
